content: share the file or any parts of the written pattern and/or charts you have no right to create a video tutorial for this pattern nor to make translations to other languages without my written permission for pattern support and member discounts kindly join the crochet patterns by bebablanket group on facebook https //www facebook com/groups/bebablanketpatterns thank you for your invaluable support this pattern was created by bebablanket february 2024 this pattern was tested by jutta heisalo kim lategan esther van holland denise clark carol brunquell sutcliffe jennifer le tech editor mirjam annaars do you want to be informed about all new released patterns and special offers please subscribe to the bebablanket newsletter bebablanket com you can unsubscribe any time you want geometrica| © bebablanket 2024 page 9 of 10 annex 1 stitches symbols & abbreviations used in the chart and written pattern chart written description pattern - chart reading direction from bottom up from right to left fc - foundation cord row s / r row number s r s c - color used for this row b - blanket edge stitches the first and the last stitch on every row color a color a - background color color b color b - pattern color single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet all stitches of the first row only blanket edge stitches the first st of every row is always a standing center single_crochet stcsc the stcsc/ last st of every row is always a center single_crochet csc csc you will find more information in the file double border easy start three magic steps see the paragraph mosaic crochet basics & useful links on page 2 back loop single_crochet into the next stitch of the previous row single_crochet except the first and last stitches on every row and complete r1 front loop double_crochet into the next stitch 2 rs below in the written pattern - the number in front specifies how many sts you double_crochet have to work in the chart - 1 square =1 stitch repeat of the entire pattern the number of repeats depends … x on how many multiples of 48 your foundation cord has the written pattern is written for 5 repeats repeat of a small part of the pattern - *…* x repeat this the number of times specified geometrica| © bebablanket 2024 page 10 of 10
